name: Augmented
description: Nearly everyone on your Union Crawler is augmented in some way and your medical technicians are able to implement a variety of body modifications with ease.

npc.description: Your Union Crawler has an advanced, intelligent A.I. on board which controls its core functions. The A.I. is jacked into the Corpo Net, once per Downtime you can ask them two questions about any topic and they will answer you truthfully. Name your A.I. and roll on the A.I. Personality Table for their personality.

choices.name: A.I. Personality
choices.description: Roll on the A.I. Personality Table for their personality.

actions.name: Crawler Wide Augments
actions.description: Every Pilot on the Union Crawler may train any Pilot Ability from the Augment Ability Tree in addition to their other abilities. When you choose this Crawler Type during character creation all Pilots gain an additional Training Point which they may only spend on the Augment Ability Tree.

name: Battle
description: Your Crawler is equipped to better defend itself in the wastelands. It bristles with armour and armaments and many on board are highly trained and effective fighters

npc.description: A Grizzled Veteran is part of your Union Crawler. Name them and give them a Keepsake and Motto. They have 10 HP.

choices.name: Keepsake
choices.description: A Keepsake is a personal item that represents something important to the NPC. It could be a memento from their past, a family heirloom, or something they have worked hard to acquire. The Keepsake is a reminder of the NPC's history and personality.

choices.name: Motto
choices.description: A Motto is a personal saying or phrase that represents the NPC's personality or beliefs. It could be something they live by, or something they are trying to achieve. The Motto is a reminder of the NPC's personality and goals.

actions.name: Improved Armour and Armaments
actions.description: Your Union Crawler may mount two Weapons Systems in its Armament Bay instead of the usual one and make two attacks on its turn. In addition, the Crawler increases its Max SP by 5.

choices.name: Additional Armament Bay Weapons System
choices.description: Choose a Weapons System to mount in the Armament Bay.

name: Engineering
description: Your Crawler is designed for maximum efficiency, functioning with the bare minimum of scrap expenditure thanks to the efforts of your well-oiled engineering team.

npc.description: An engineer who is one step ahead of their peers has joined your Union Crawler. Name them and give them a Keepsake and Motto. They have 4 HP.

actions.name: Exceptional Engineering
actions.description: Your Union Crawler reduces its upkeep cost by 2 Scrap of its Tech Level. In addition add 2 free Scrap of itâ€™s Tech Level to its Upgrade Pool at the start of each Downtime.

name: Exploratory
description: Exploratory Crawlers are designed to get to the hardest to reach places in the wasteland. They have unique and even bizarre locomotion systems that let them travel over terrain that range from spider-like legs and multiple articulated tracks to tunnelling maws and complex hover systems.

npc.description: A Wasteland Explorer is part of your Union Crawler. Name them and if you wish, give them a Keepsake and Motto. They have 4 HP.

actions.name: All Terrain Locomotion
actions.description: Your Union Crawler has the ability to easily traverse over a vast range of terrain types from mountain ranges and ash-filled plains to dense forests and muddy swamplands. It is never slowed down by Difficult Terrain. It can also safely cross bodies of water amphibiously.

name: Trade Caravan
description: Your Crawler is geared towards trade in the wastelands, giving you better deals and attracting more folk willing to trade better quality goods

npc.description: A Savvy Trader is part of your Union Crawler.  Name them and give them a Keepsake and Motto. They have 4 HP.

actions.name: Imrpoved Trading Bay
actions.description: When you roll to see what is available in the Trading Bay use this table instead. Trade available is always one Tech Level higher than your Union Crawler and can be purchased for its Salvage Value as per the normal trading rules. Chassis, Systems, and Modules available for trade are determined randomly or by the Mediator.

table.1: Re-roll on this table. If a 1 is rolled again nothing is available for trade this Downtime.
table.20: An Intact Mech Chassis, System, and Module are all available for trade.
table.11-19: An Intact Mech Chassis and an Intact System are available for trade.
table.6-10: An Intact Mech Chassis and an Intact Module are available for trade.
table.2-5: An Intact System and an Intact Module are available for trade.
